items.sentence: Have you ever been to the store where Tom works?
Have you ever heard such beautiful music before?
Have you gotten settled into your new house yet?
Tom is the only person who can do that, I think.
Tom is unlikely to want to go to Boston with us.
Tom said he had something important to ask Mary.
Tom said he had something very important to say.
Tom said he has a lot of homework to do tonight.
Tom said he hoped he never had to do that again.
Tom said he thought Mary would enjoy doing that.
